C - Optimal Strategy

Solution

æœ€å¤§å€¼çš„ä¸ªæ•°ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°æ—¶å…ˆæ‰‹å¿…å®šé€‰å–ï¼Œè½¬æ¢ä¸ºå¶æ•°çš„æƒ…å†µã€‚
å½“ä»»æ„ä¸€ä¸ªäººé€‰å–æ—¶ï¼Œå¦ä¸€ä¸ªäººå¿…å®šè·Ÿéšé€‰å–ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘è®²å…ƒç´ æŒ‰ä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ·»åŠ è®¡ç®—ã€‚å½“å‰ä¸º nnn ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•° fffï¼ŒåŠ å…¥ ccc ä¸ªç›¸åŒçš„æ›´å¤§çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼šæ–°çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ä¸º fâ€²=fÃ—c!Ã—(n+âŒŠc/2âŒ‹n)f' = f \times c! \times \binom{n + \lfloor c/2 \rfloor}{n}fâ€²=fÃ—c!Ã—(nn+âŒŠc/2âŒ‹â€‹) ã€‚

D - Arithmetic Sequence

Solution

å‡è®¾ç­‰å·®æ•°åˆ—ä¸º ki+bki + bki+bï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆç­”æ¡ˆä¸º aiâˆ’kia_i - kiaiâ€‹âˆ’ki åˆ° bbb çš„è·ç¦»å’Œã€‚
è®° f(k)f(k)f(k) ä¸ºå›ºå®š kkkï¼Œbbb å¯å˜æ—¶å–å¾—çš„æœ€å°å€¼ã€‚ï¼ˆå¯ä»¥ O(n)O(n)O(n) è®¡ç®—ã€‚ï¼‰

å¯ä»¥å‘ç° limâ¡kâ†’Â±âˆf(k)â†’+âˆ\lim \limits _{k \to \pm \infty} f(k) \to + \inftykâ†’Â±âˆlimâ€‹f(k)â†’+âˆï¼ŒçŒœæµ‹ fff ä¸ºä¸Šå‡¹å‡½æ•°ã€‚
è€ƒè™‘è¯æ˜ 2f(k)â‰¤f(kâˆ’1)+f(k+1)2f(k) \leq f(k - 1) + f(k + 1)2f(k)â‰¤f(kâˆ’1)+f(k+1)ã€‚

2f(k)=âˆ‘âˆ£2tiâˆ’2b0âˆ£2f(k) = \sum \left | 2t_i - 2b_0 \right |2f(k)=âˆ‘âˆ£2tiâ€‹âˆ’2b0â€‹âˆ£
f(kâˆ’1)=âˆ‘âˆ£ti+iâˆ’b1âˆ£f(k - 1) = \sum \left | t_i + i - b_1 \right |f(kâˆ’1)=âˆ‘âˆ£tiâ€‹+iâˆ’b1â€‹âˆ£
f(k+1)=âˆ‘âˆ£tiâˆ’iâˆ’b2âˆ£f(k + 1) = \sum \left | t_i - i - b_2 \right|f(k+1)=âˆ‘âˆ£tiâ€‹âˆ’iâˆ’b2â€‹âˆ£
f(kâˆ’1)+f(k+1)â‰¥âˆ‘âˆ£2tiâˆ’b1âˆ’b2âˆ£â‰¥2f(k)f(k - 1) + f(k + 1) \geq \sum \left | 2t_i - b_1 - b_2 \right | \geq 2f(k)f(kâˆ’1)+f(k+1)â‰¥âˆ‘âˆ£2tiâ€‹âˆ’b1â€‹âˆ’b2â€‹âˆ£â‰¥2f(k)

å› æ­¤å¯ä»¥ç”¨ä¸‰åˆ†è§£å†³é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ€»æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º O(nlogw)O(nlogw)O(nlogw) ã€‚

Solution

ä½¿ç”¨æµ®ç‚¹æ•°è®¡ç®—ç²¾åº¦ä¸å¤Ÿã€‚ä½¿ç”¨æ•´å‹å¤æ‚åº¦é¢å¤–å¸¦ä¸ª logâ¡\loglog ä¸”ä½æ•°è¿‡å¤šã€‚

å–æ¨¡è®¡ç®—ï¼ŸğŸ¤” æ€ä¹ˆåˆ¤æ–­ç»å¯¹å€¼ï¼Ÿ

+xâ‰¡âˆ’x(modp)+x \equiv -x \pmod p+xâ‰¡âˆ’x(modp) å½“ä¸”ä»…å½“ (pâˆ£x)âˆ¨(p=2x)(p \mid x) \lor (p = 2x)(pâˆ£x)âˆ¨(p=2x) æ—¶æˆç«‹ã€‚

äºæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦æ‰¾ä¸€äº›ç‰¹æ®Šçš„æ¨¡æ•°ç¨åŠ è®¡ç®—å³å¯ã€‚

ç‰¹åˆ«çš„ï¼Œoddâ¡(p)âˆ§(pâˆ¤x)\operatorname{odd}(p) \land (p \nmid x)odd(p)âˆ§(pâˆ¤x) æ—¶ï¼Œodd(+x)=even(âˆ’x)odd(+x) = even(-x)odd(+x)=even(âˆ’x) ã€‚

Search for Mafuyu

èŠ±äº†å¾ˆä¹…çš„æ—¶é—´æƒ³æœ€ä¼˜çš„è´ªå¿ƒç­–ç•¥ï¼ŒğŸ¤¡ ä½†æ˜¯å®é™…ä¸Šä»»æ„é¡ºåºéƒ½æ˜¯ç›¸åŒçš„ã€‚

Solution

éå†å­æ ‘ vvv å¹¶è¿”å›ä¸€å…±éœ€è¦èŠ±è´¹ 2siz(v)2siz(v)2siz(v) æ­¥ï¼ˆæ¯æ¡è¾¹èµ°ä¸¤æ¬¡ï¼‰ã€‚

ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´æŒ‰ä»»æ„é¡ºåº dfsâ¡\operatorname{dfs}dfs å¹¶è®¡ç®—å°±å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚

entry.title: [CCPC 2021] è£œå®Œè¨ˆåŠƒãƒ»æ¡‚æ—
entry.content:
Problem Status Tags
A - A Hero Named Magnus ğŸˆ ğŸ’§
B - A Plus B Problem ğŸ’€ å¹³è¡¡æ ‘
C - AC Automaton ğŸ’€
D - Assume is All You Need ğŸˆ æ„é€ 
E - Buy and Delete ğŸ’€ æœ€çŸ­è·¯ | æœ€å°ç¯
F - Illuminations 2 ğŸ’€
G - Occupy the Cities ğŸˆ æ¨¡æ‹Ÿ
H - Popcount Words ğŸ’€
I - PTSD ğŸˆ è´ªå¿ƒ
J - Suffix Automaton ğŸ’€
K - Tax ğŸ’€ æœç´¢
L - Wiring Engineering ğŸ’€

A - A Hero Named Magnus

  • ç®€å•ç­¾åˆ°ï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆä¸º 2xâˆ’12 x - 12xâˆ’1 ã€‚

B - A Plus B Problem

Solution

Ci=(Ai+Bi+[Aj+Bjâ‰¥10]â€Šmodâ€Š10)C_i = ( A_i + B_i + [A_j + B_j \ge 10] \bmod 10 )Ciâ€‹=(Aiâ€‹+Biâ€‹+[Ajâ€‹+Bjâ€‹â‰¥10]mod10)ï¼Œ
å…¶ä¸­ jjj ä¸º iii å¾€ä½ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ»¡è¶³ Aj+Bjneâ¡9A_j + B_j \operatorname{ne} 9Ajâ€‹+Bjâ€‹ne9 çš„ä½ã€‚

å¦‚æœ iii ä½æ˜¯å¦è¿›ä½çš„çŠ¶æ€æ”¹å˜ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¾€é«˜åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ»¡è¶³ Aj+Bjneâ¡9A_j + B_j \operatorname{ne} 9Ajâ€‹+Bjâ€‹ne9 çš„ä½ jjj éƒ½ä¼šæ”¹å˜ã€‚

é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦ç»´æŠ¤æ‰€æœ‰æ»¡è¶³ Ai+Bineâ¡9A_i + B_i \operatorname{ne} 9Aiâ€‹+Biâ€‹ne9 çš„ä½ iii å°±å¯å¾ˆå¿«è§£å†³é—®é¢˜ã€‚

è€ƒåœºä¸Šè®¡åˆ’ç»´æŠ¤å®é™…ç»“æœä¸­è¿ç»­çš„ 0 ä¸ 9 çš„åŒºé—´ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ç»†èŠ‚è¿‡å¤šï¼Œå†™æŒ‚äº†ã€‚ğŸ˜°

Code

const int MAX_N = 1000005;

int a[2][MAX_N];
set<int> st;
int n, q;

void get_num(int *a) {
    static char s[MAX_N];
    scanf("%s", s + 1);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) a[i] = s[i] - '0';
}

int main() {

    scanf("%d%d", &n, &q);
    get_num(a[0]), get_num(a[1]);
    
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i)
        if (a[0][i] + a[1][i] != 9)
            st.insert(i);
    st.insert(0);
    st.insert(n + 1);
    
    for (int k, i, v, j, cnt; q; --q) {
    
        scanf("%d%d%d", &k, &i, &v); --k;
    
        j = *st.upper_bound(i);
        bool low_carry = (j <= n and a[0][j] + a[1][j] >= 10);
        
        if (a[k][i] == v) cnt = 0; else {
            cnt = 2;
            bool old_carry = (a[0][i] + a[1][i] + low_carry >= 10);
            bool new_carry = (a[k ^ 1][i] + v + low_carry >= 10);
            if (old_carry != new_carry) {
                j = *--st.lower_bound(i);
                cnt += (j ? i - j : i - 1);
            }
            if (a[0][i] + a[1][i] == 9) st.insert(i);
            if (a[k ^ 1][i] + v == 9) st.erase(i);
            a[k][i] = v;
        }
    
        printf("%d %d\n", (a[0][i] + a[1][i] + low_carry) % 10, cnt);
    
    }
    
    return 0;

}

C - AC Automaton

D - Assume is All You Need

Solution

å¯ä»¥å‘ç°è¾ƒå¤§çš„å…ƒç´ ä½ç½®è¶Šé å‰æ˜¯è¶Šæœ‰åˆ©äºæˆ‘ä»¬çš„è¡ŒåŠ¨çš„ã€‚åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ äº¤æ¢åˆ°ç›®æ ‡ä½ç½®çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œä¸æ–­åœ°å°†è¯¥å…ƒç´ å’ŒåŒºé—´å†…æœ€å¤§çš„å…ƒç´ è¿›è¡Œäº¤æ¢ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¿è¯è¾ƒå¤§çš„å…ƒç´ å°½é‡é å‰ï¼Œä¸ä¼šæŸå¤±è§£ã€‚

Code

typedef pair<int, int> pii; 

const int MAX_N = 2025, MAX_K = 2041215;

int pos_a[MAX_N], pos_b[MAX_N];
int a[MAX_N], b[MAX_N];
pii ans[MAX_K];

int main() {
	int T, n;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	while (T--) {
		
		scanf("%d", &n);
		for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) scanf("%d", a + i), pos_a[a[i]] = i;
		for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) scanf("%d", b + i), pos_b[b[i]] = i;
		
		int cnt = 0; bool unsolvable = 0;
		
		for (int i = n; i; --i) {
			int &st = pos_a[i], ed = pos_b[i];
			for (int j = i - 1; j; --j) {
				if (pos_a[j] > st and pos_a[j] <= ed) {
					ans[++cnt] = pii(st, pos_a[j]);
					swap(st, pos_a[j]);
				}
			}
			if (st != ed) { unsolvable = 1; break; }
		}
		
		if (unsolvable) puts("-1");
		else {
			printf("%d\n", cnt);
			for (int i = 1; i <= cnt; ++i)
				printf("%d %d\n", ans[i].first, ans[i].second);
		}
	
	}
	return 0;
}

E - Buy and Delete

ç«Ÿæ­»äºä¸çŸ¥é“ DAG ä¸­çš„ A â€”â€” Acyclic è¿™ä¸ªè¯ã€‚ğŸ¶ è‹±è¯­ï¼Œæ—©è¯¥å­¦å­¦äº†ã€‚

Solution

å½“è¾¹é›†ä¸ºç©ºæ—¶ç­”æ¡ˆä¸º 0ï¼Œè¾¹é›†æ— ç¯æ—¶ç­”æ¡ˆä¸º 1ï¼Œè¾¹é›†æœ‰ç¯æ—¶ç­”æ¡ˆä½ 2 ã€‚

ç†è§£ä¸€ï¼šç¬¬ä¸€éåˆ é™¤æ ‘è¾¹å’Œæ¨ªå‰è¾¹ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒéåˆ é™¤è¿”ç¥–è¾¹ã€‚
ç†è§£äºŒï¼šå¯ä»¥ä¸€éåˆ é™¤æ»¡è¶³ u<vu < vu<v çš„è¾¹ (u,Â v)(u,\ v)(u,Â v)ï¼Œç„¶ååˆ é™¤æ»¡è¶³ u>vu > vu>v çš„è¾¹ã€‚

é—®é¢˜è½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ±‚æœ€å°è¾¹ä¸æœ€å°ç¯ã€‚è·‘ nnn éå•æºæœ€çŸ­è·¯å³å¯ã€‚

Code

typedef pair<int, int> pii;

const int MAX_N = 2005, MAX_M = 5005;

struct edge {
	int v, w, nxt;
	edge(int v = 0, int w = 0, int nxt = 0)
	: v(v), w(w), nxt(nxt) {}
} e[MAX_M];

int dist[MAX_N][MAX_N];
int head[MAX_N], tot;
int n, m, c;

void lnk(int u, int v, int w) {
	e[++tot] = edge(v, w, head[u]);
	head[u] = tot;
}

void dij(int s) {
	priority_queue<pii> pq;
	
	int *d = dist[s];
	
	pq.push(pii(d[s] = 0, s));
	while (!pq.empty()) {
		pii top = pq.top(); pq.pop();
		int u = top.second;
		if (d[u] < -top.first) continue;
		for (int i = head[u]; i; i = e[i].nxt) {
			int v = e[i].v, w = e[i].w, t = d[u] + w;
			if (d[v] > t) 
				pq.push(pii(-(d[v] = t), v));
		}
	}
}

int main() {
	scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &c);
	for (int i = 1, u, v, w; i <= m; ++i) {
		scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &w);
		lnk(u, v, w);
	}
	int ans = 0;
	memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof(dist));
	for (int s = 1; s <= n; ++s) dij(s);
	for (int u = 1; u < n; ++u)
	for (int v = u + 1; v <= n; ++v) {
		if (dist[u][v] <= c or dist[v][u] <= c) ans = 1;
		if (dist[u][v] + dist[v][u] <= c) {
			ans = 2;
			goto output_part;
		} 
	}
	output_part:
		printf("%d\n", ans);
	return 0;
}

F - Illuminations 2

G - Occupy the Cities

Solution

å¤„ç†å‡ºè¿ç»­çš„ 1 åŒºé—´ä¹‹é—´çš„è·ç¦»ã€‚å¹¶åˆ’åˆ† 1 åŒºé—´çš„å±æ€§ï¼šå•æ•°æˆ–è€…å¤æ•°ã€‚å•æ•°çš„åŒºé—´ä¸€è½®åªèƒ½å¾€å·¦å³ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹å‘æ‰©å±•ï¼Œè€Œå¤æ•°çš„åŒºé—´å¯ä»¥åŒæ—¶å¾€ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–¹å‘æ‰©å±•ã€‚ç‰¹æ®Šå¤„ç†ç¬¬ä¸€è½®ï¼Œä¹‹åçš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒºé—´éƒ½æ˜¯å¤æ•°åŒºé—´ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç®€å•è®¡ç®—ã€‚

Code

const int MAX_N = 1000005;

bool sg[MAX_N];
char s[MAX_N];
int d[MAX_N];
int n;

void chkmx(int &a, const int& b) { if (a < b) a = b; }

int main() {
	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while (T--) {
		
		scanf("%d%s", &n, s + 1);
		int m = 0, r = 0; bool g = 0;
		
		for (int l = 1; l <= n; ++l) if (s[l] == '1') {
			
			g |= (d[++m] = l - r - 1);
			
			for(r = l; r < n and s[r + 1] == '1'; ++r);
			sg[m] = (l == r);
			
			l = r;
			
		}
		
		g |= (d[m + 1] = n - r);
		
		if (!g) puts("0"); else {
			
			d[1] = (d[1] << 1) - 1;
			d[m + 1] = (d[m + 1] << 1) - 1;
			for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) {
				if (!sg[i]) --d[i], --d[i + 1];
				else (d[i] >= d[i + 1]) ? --d[i] : --d[i + 1];
			}
			
			int ans = 0;
			for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) chkmx(ans, (d[i] + 1) >> 1);
			chkmx(ans, (d[m + 1] + 1) >> 1);
			printf("%d\n", ans + 1);
			
		}
		
	}
	return 0;
}

H - Popcount Words

I - PTSD

Solution

æ±‚æœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œäºæ˜¯ä¼˜å…ˆç»™å€¼å¤§çš„å…ƒç´ ç»„é˜Ÿã€‚ä»åå¾€å‰è´ªå¿ƒæ±‚è§£å³å¯ã€‚

Code

typedef long long ll;

const int MAX_N = 1000005;

char s[MAX_N];
int n;

int main() {
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	while (T--) {
		scanf("%d%s", &n, s + 1);
		ll ans=0;
		for (int i = n, g = 0; i; --i) {
			if (s[i] == '1' and g) --g, ans += i;
			else ++g;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}

J - Suffix Automaton

K - Tax

é¢˜æ„ä¸ºå…ˆæ»¡è¶³æœ€çŸ­è·¯ï¼Œå†è¦æ±‚èŠ±è´¹æœ€å°ã€‚å®¡é¢˜æŒ‚æ‰ã€‚ğŸ™Š

Solution

æ ¹æ®é¢˜æ„ï¼Œç›´æ¥åœ¨æœ€çŸ­è·¯çš„åŸºç¡€ä¸Šè¿›è¡Œæœç´¢ã€‚

æ ¹æ®å¹‚å¹³å‡ä¸ç­‰å¼ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦åœ¨æ¯å±‚ç‚¹æ•°éƒ½ç›¸åŒçš„åˆ†å±‚å›¾æ—¶æœ€å¤§ï¼Œä¸º O(expâ¡(nlnâ¡xx))O(\exp({n \cfrac{\ln x}{x}}))O(exp(nxlnxâ€‹)) ã€‚

æ±‚å¯¼æœ€åå¯å¾—åœ¨ x=3x = 3x=3 æ—¶å¤æ‚åº¦æœ€å¤§ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡é¢˜ç›®ã€‚

Code

const int MAX_N = 55, MAX_M = 1235, MAX_2M = 2505;

struct edge {
	int v, c, nxt;
	edge(int v = 0, int c = 0, int nxt = 0)
	: v(v), c(c), nxt(nxt) {}
} e[MAX_2M];

int tax[MAX_M], cnt[MAX_M];
int d[MAX_N], cost[MAX_N];
int head[MAX_N], tot;
int n, m;

inline void lnk(int u, int v, int c) {
	e[++tot] = edge(v, c, head[u]);
	head[u] = tot;
}

void bfs(int s) {
	queue<int> q;
	d[s] = 1; q.push(s);
	while (!q.empty()) {
		int u = q.front(); q.pop();
		for (int i = head[u]; i; i = e[i].nxt) {
			int v = e[i].v;
			if (!d[v]) { d[v] = d[u] + 1; q.push(v); }
		}
	}
}

void dfs(int u, int g = 0) {
	if (cost[u] > g) cost[u] = g;
	for (int i = head[u]; i; i = e[i].nxt) {
		int v = e[i].v, c = e[i].c;
		if (d[v] != d[u] + 1) continue;
		++cnt[c];
		dfs(v, g + cnt[c] * tax[c]);
		--cnt[c];
	}
}

int main() {
	scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
	for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) scanf("%d", tax + i);
	for (int i = 1, u, v, c; i <= m; ++i) {
		scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &c);
		lnk(u, v, c), lnk(v, u, c);
	}
	memset(cost, 0x3f, sizeof(cost));
	bfs(1);
	dfs(1);
	for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) printf("%d\n", cost[i]);
	return 0;
}

L - Wiring Engineering
